xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Module implementing the sumproduct functions from Excel 2003 math library. There are 30 functions defined, implementing the same function but with 1 to 30 parameters. Each parameter can be a sequence of infinite length.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Daniel Turcanu

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Import excel-math module functions.
Sums the values in the sequence. The sequence can be of any length.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $array1 the sequence of numbers or arguments castable to numeric
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if the parameters cannot be casted to numeric type

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel:sumproduct
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel:sumproduct($array1 as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:anyAtomicType

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Multiplies the elements on the same position in each sequence and sums up the results.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $array1 the sequences of numbers or arguments castable to numeric
$array2 the sequences of numbers or arguments castable to numeric
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if the parameters cannot be casted to numeric type

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: excel:sumproduct
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function excel:sumproduct($array1 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $array2 as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:anyAtomicType

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Multiplies the elements on the same position in each sequence and sums up the results.

$array2 the sequences of numbers or arguments castable to numeric
$array3 the sequences of numbers or arguments castable to numeric
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: excel-err:Value if the parameters cannot be casted to numeric type
